actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that $35 per month of transit passes provided by an employer shall be excluded from gross income.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income transit passes provided by an employer to an employee for mass transit facilities. Limits such exclusion to $35 per month.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that $35 per month of transit passes provided by an employer shall be excluded from gross income.
